title: 820-2914 short with battery
message:
green light and turn on(reset at the loading) without battery.
when connected battery green light goes off and not turn on.
changed u7000 but the same.
ppbus 19.5 with battery 10.8
any idea?

title: 820-2914 short with battery
message: Probably shorted Q7030. Replace Q7030 and U7000.

title: 820-2914 short with battery
message:
replaced both...still the same..
when battery connected and connect the charger the is green light for 1sec then turn off and the fan spin for 3-4sec.
when just battery connected smc_on_off cant turn in on.
and with just the charger there is green and orange light and it turn on but dont pass the loading.

title: 820-2914 short with battery
message: PPBUS_G3H should be 12.6V without battery, not 19.5V. If it is 19.5V then Q7030 is always passing current between drain and source. Make sure it is not shorted and make sure its gate has good continuity to U7000.

title: 820-2914 short with battery
message: o.k i was replace again now ppbus_g3h is 6-7v with just charger..

title: 820-2914 short with battery
message:
Check all traces and solders around U7000.
Post its basic voltages; pins 1, 2, 3, 9, 12, 13, 14, 15, 17, 19, 20, 27.
Just in case, replace C7025.
